Update Driver from libusK Driver to COM PortÔÉÅ

To update and retrieve COM ports, follow the following steps:

  1. Go to Device Manager. Expand the libusbK USB Devices and right click on the InnoPhase T2 Evaluation Board (Composite Parent). Click on Update Driver as shown in Figure 22.

Figure 22: Device Manager

  1. On the new window, click on Let me pick from a list of available drivers on my computer option and click on Next.

Figure 23: Update Devices

  1. Select USB Composite Device and install the same for reinstalling COM posts.

Figure 24: Select the device driver
